name: Color scheme
description: The color scheme of the application. Set to custom to choose your own colors.

name: Some random setting
description: This is some random setting so idk.

name: Use inspection
description: Limits the amount of time you have to look at the cube before starting the solve.

name: Inspection time
description: The amount of time, in seconds, that you get to spend in inspection.

name: Decimal places
description: The number of digits displayed after the decimal point for any time value displayed.
